title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

So-Called President-Elect Biden makes dour speech on COVID. Biden thinks he was elected president, but he wasn't. The media doesn't decide who wins an election, the people do. Biden says wearing masks will bring the country together. Biden will get credit for the vaccine he's been denigrating. Stock market jumps on vaccine news. Trump said vaccine was coming, and the Democrats called him a liar. CNN drops coronavirus graphics, coronavirus will disappear as an issue now that election is over. Trump should name czar or point person to communicate on the election investigation, with laser-like focus on protecting the Constitution, don't get distracted by anecdotal examples here or there. Democrats don't care if 70 million Americans don't trust the election, they may even prefer it that way. Ken Starr on the Constitutional stakes, illegality in Pennsylvania, Alito decision. We cannot go forward with the election system in doubt in every election. Lesley Stahl's question to Rush about whether he would tell his listeners to remain calm after the election. Unwinding what the Democrats have done is a huge, but vital, undertaking. Trump told us the vaccine was close, was held back until after the election.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Trump fires Secretary of Defense Mark Esper. Rush will be out starting tomorrow for treatment week. Caller says we should be happy it wasn't a blue wave, repudiation of Trump. Stopping a blue wave isn't enough, Schumer and company are on a mission to flip the Senate. William Holden in The Wild Bunch. We must stand by Donald Trump and the Trump family, not just because they stood by us, but to protect the Constitution. This is bigger than any one election. Fox News turned its back on its base, led by the Murdoch children. The left has been unsuccessful in getting talk radio to turn on its listeners. Sidney Powell's rundown of fraud allegations. Elected Republicans, Mitt Romney and the Bushes turned their backs on the voters who supported them. Pissed-off caller wants to know where AG Barr is.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Rush goes over again why he thinks Trump needs to name an election czar to coordinate the election investigation. Al Gore got 37 days to contest one state, we can take the time to investigate this election. Sidney Powell: 450,000 ballots only have one name on them. Five swing states are within 1% and every one shows Biden in the lead? Rush's wild guess on what William F. Buckley would think of what's happening today. Lincoln's warning on those that would pervert the Constitution. It's going to take time to track down and confirm all the fraud that took place in this election. Attorney Lin Wood joins Trump team: They took a victory from Donald Trump and called it a lie. Getting angry doesn't accomplish anything.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
